title: Ranked Dynamic queues
body:
For a solo ranked player, it is unfair and no point of ranked since individual skill means nothing. The Dynamic picks is good but needs to be dynamic solo only mode to make ranked mean something. I may not even try in games where its a group of friends vs a smaller group of friends or just solos. riot says It is suppose to mirror the lobbies so that if there is a duo on one side, it should also be a duo on the other team, that is not the case for me.

So if the match making makes it unfair, I make its 4v5. I know I will receive verbal abuse and hate speech, but riot does not care so why should I.

replies.body:
Queue alone and you'll get matched with other solo people, unless if it will take too long to organise 10 solo players, in which case the system will create the next best match up.
Considering you are in Silver 2 I highly doubt that you're struggling with queue in the way you're complaining.

As for individual skill, you're kidding yourself if you think that's how the system works at all, you gain MMR solely on if you win or lose, no other factors.

Luckily for you, Riot is releasing a[ true solo que](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback) in the near future.  

Also, what do you mean by: "_So if the match making makes it unfair, I make its 4v5. I know I will receive verbal abuse and hate speech, but riot does not care so why should I_."?
Have already seen it previously stated that OCE is NOT getting true solo que, it would affect our already strained queue times, much as how we don't have Twisted treeline as  a permanent mode either.
There has yet to be an official statement as to whether or not OCE is getting solo q, but for the moment, we just gotta have hope :3
